DOC.brief_summary: A preliminary Study Subjects Undergoing Low Anterior Resection
DOC.brief_title: LifeSeal™ Preliminary Study Subjects Undergoing Low Anterior Resection
DOC.criteria: 1 . Subject , authorized representative , sign write Informed Consent 2 . Subject least 18 year age 3 . Subject schedule elective open resection 4 . Stapled anastomosis create within 10cm anal verge 5 . Subject willing comply followup requirement study 1 . Subject history hypersensitivity porcine derive gelatin collagen 2 . Subject unacceptable baseline hematological result 3 . Subject chronic preoperative treatment steroid anticoagulants 4 . Subject elevate liver function test 5 . Subject abnormal kidney function 6 . Subject BMI high 35 7 . Subject participate study either drug device influence collection valid data study 8 . Subject history MI , CVA ASA status IV life expectancy le 1 year 9 . Anastomosis perform differently define 10 . Subject receive intraoperative sealant , glue buttress material study related anastomosis , LifeSeal™ 11 . Subject intraoperative bleeding excess 500cc 12 . Subject peritoneal carcinomatosis
